page.title: 10A DAY IN MY LIFE
page.content: l ate my breakfast which was frosties. Afterwards l did my teeth, l used Colgate blue minty gel and then my sister and l went ballroom dancing. We danced the quickstep,foxtrot and the jive. I got home from ballroom dancing at 11.00. and went to violins at Fort Pitt Grammar school and on the way we followed some friends.At violins we played Jumping Jacks,Russian Ballet and Maclans Welcome. I got home from violins at 12.50, I switched on the TV and Grandstand was on. l had a bacon sandwich, a cake and a glass of milk.I got ready to go to Gillingham and to see my sister at the music festival at Upbury Manor School. We got to Gillingham and my mum and l went shopping, l brought myself a jacket and Mum a bar of soap. We went back to the music festival and listened to the recorders at 5.15.
